title: Double Surrenders
body: During my ranked game after the opponent's team surrendered, 4 members of my team also surrendered. Instead of the loss going to the team that first surrendered the loss went to us and I was in my promotions. Could something be done about this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you sure the enemy team actually surrendered? It's possible they simply faked the surrender message in chat.

Anyway, your team voted to surrender and thus the game was marked as a loss, there's nothing that can be done about this.

They definitely surrendered, the map moved to their nexus and shortly after moved to our nexus and showed us the message DEFEAT; after the game the opponents were also confused proving there was no way that they faked the surrender message.
